cards.title: Scale
powers: Destroy a balance card. Draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power
Increase or reduce all damage by 1 until the start of your next turn.

openingLines.default: You are causing imbalance. You will stop, now.
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.EidolonCharacter: Corrupter. You brought darkness to the temple of the scales. You will be destroyed.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Nothingness may be a form of balance, but there's a better way.

cards.title: Star
cards.flavorText: This starlight penetrates even the darkest{br}clouds.

cards.title: Black Hole
cards.body: Whenever a character card takes damage, discard the top card of its owner's deck
cards.flavorText: The pull of gravity is an undeniable force{br}of destruction.

cards.title: Moons
cards.body: All damage dealt to villain targets is redirected to the villain target with the highest HP. All damage dealt to hero targets is redirected to the hero target with the highest HP. All damage dealt to environment targets is redirected to the environment target with the highest HP.
cards.flavorText: Many people orbit around a strong{br}leader.

cards.title: Particle
cards.body: Increase damage dealt by the hero target with the lowest HP, villain target with the lowest HP, and environment target with the lowest HP by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: I will devour you all! You are specks before me!
The smallest grain of dust can still{br}be dangerous.

cards.title: Meteor
cards.body: At the start of your turn, {Scale} deals each target 2 energy damage.
cards.flavorText: A meteor burns brightly until it burns up.

cards.title: Cosmic Scales
cards.body: At the end of your turn, either put a balance card from your hand into play, destroy a balance card, or draw a card.
cards.flavorText: The tools of the balancer's trade.{br}Don't touch.

cards.title: Starfire Beam
powers: {Scale} deals 1 target 2 fire damage. You may play a balance card or destroy a balance card.
cards.flavorText: By the light of the sun, be purged,{br}vampire!

cards.title: Shift Balance
cards.body: Destroy a balance card. Search your deck for a balance card and put it into play, then shuffle it. {Scale} deals each non-hero target 1 infernal damage.
cards.flavorText: You are not the only one with a hand on{br}the scales, corrupter.

cards.title: Empty Power
cards.body: Destroy all balance cards. {Scale} deals 1 target X irreducible energy damage, where X is the number of cards destroyed this way times 3.
cards.flavorText: Don't worry! Everything will return to{br}normal momentarily!

cards.title: Attune
cards.body: Move any number of balance cards from your trash to your hand. {Scale} deals 1 target 3 energy damage

cards.title: Gravitic Strike
cards.body: {Scale} deals 1 target 3 melee damage and up to 2 other targets 1 energy damage each. Destroy an environment card.

cards.title: Desperate Rift
cards.body: Play a balance card. {Scale} deals 3 targets 3 infernal damage each. Discard the top card of each deck.
cards.flavorText: Error: Negative energy drain exceeds{br}generator output.

cards.title: Fold Space
cards.body: Reduce the next damage dealt to Scale by 2. {Scale} deals 1 target 1 melee and 1 energy damage.
cards.flavorText: Where did you go? Get back here,{br}old man!

cards.title: Blind Justice
cards.body: Until the end of your next turn, reduce damage dealt by {Scale} by 2. Draw 4 cards.

cards.title: Convincing Words
cards.body: One villain target deals itself 2 psychic damage. If no damage is dealt this way, it deals 1 other villain target 4 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: Look at what you're doing, Ludramor. Is{br}this what your people would want?

cards.title: Weigh Options
cards.body: Choose 2. You may choose the same option twice: Draw a card, {Scale} deals 1 target 2 energy damage, Destroy an ongoing or environment card, or {Scale} regains 2 HP.

promoCards.title: Scale
powers: Put a Balance card from your hand into play. If you do, {Scale} deals 1 target 3 infernal damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may draw a card
One player may play a card
One hero may use a power. If that power would deal damage, increase it by 1.

openingLines.default: You are an affront to balance!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: It brings balance... The absolute balance of nothingness.
